page.title: 07TRANSPORT IN BITTESWELL.
page.content: Our block is crossed by many small roads which join up lots of small villages in east Leicestershire.These are mostly flat,but many of them are impassable in heavy winter snow. The M.1. runs through our block,and the nearest junction is at Lutterworth.It was the first BRITISH motorway. There is also the main Leicester to Rugby road which runs parallel to the M.1. The railway line which joins London and the north runs through our block. Many firms have set up on the eastern edge of our block because it is easy to reach other parts of Britain from there.
